newsitem.title: CANADA: TABLE- Algoma Central Q2 profits up.
newsitem.headline: TABLE- Algoma Central Q2 profits up.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Note: The main factors contributing to the improvement in net income were aa

lower amortization expense on vessels of $1,590,000 due to a change in the estimated remaining economic lives of the vessels effective January 1, 1997, a gain of $1,278,00 on the sale of certain lands, and a general improvement in the operating profitability of the vessel fleet.
Full name is Algoma Central Corp
